name: Paul Johnston - current focus: moving electrons

content.html: That lack of consistency has meant that different teams have built elements in different ways. It has also meant that some decisions and their consequences have not been fully understood, (even though some of them I have been explaining the issues from the first day I arrived).
content.value:
That lack of consistency has meant that different teams have built elements in different ways.

It has also meant that some decisions and their consequences have not been fully understood, (even though some of them I have been explaining the issues from the first day I arrived).
